text: Ibiza (in Catalan Eivissa) is an island which is part of the Balearic Islands in the Mediterranean Sea, which all belong to Spain. It is famed for its nightclubs and nightlife. == Other websites == * Consell Insular d'Eivissa i Formentera (local government) * Official City Council Site Category:Balearic Islands Category:Phoenician colonies
title: Ibiza
